comment: Thank you for your videos, easy to understand and learn.
slide at 56:12 reminds me of communication protocols like tcp/ip protocol.

Thank you very much for your videos. I am aiming for a PhD and reviewing cell biology with your videos is so useful. However, around 16:30, it is mentioned all antibodies generally have same shape which are like Y shape. It is not entirely correct though.  Anyway, Thanks for your videos a lot.
It is true that there are variations to the Y-shape theme but for the purposes of this introductory course the general structure of the Y-shape is important to know.
